body: @genez, I have another patch for you to try if you don't mind: https://go-review.googlesource.com/23540 (It's probably easier for you to try, since I don't have your code set up; if this doesn't help I'll look into locally reproducing this with the code you posted.) Like before, use `git fetch https://go.googlesource.com/go refs/changes/40/23540/2 && git checkout FETCH_HEAD` to pull it into your local Go clone.
